name: Greta Escape
description:
Greta Escape

Special game project for EPIC GAMEJAM 2019

Fast and reflexive platformer about one girl who want to change world :)
For complete level, collect number of special items which open door for next level.

Control Keyboard 

W,D - Move
Spacebar - Jump
Left Shift - Push
E - Interaction
Escape - Pause

Control Gamepad
Left stick - Move
A - Jump
X - Push
Y - Interaction
Start- Pause

Team:
Leonid Klimenko - programming,  3d modeling, sound
Yuriy Tsygankov - general 3d designer

Made it from scratch without any prepared 3D models, sounds and blueprint code samples for the 7 days.
Powered by Unreal Engine 4.

Additional thanks SideFX for the great Houdini software which helps us working fast and efficients.
